snippets.excerpt: Abandoned watchtower on a cliff edge, half-collapsed but still offering commanding views. Wind howls through broken windows. Ancient signal fires still burn mysteriously. Perfect vantage point for spotting approaching threats or hidden paths.
snippets.conflict_hook: Bandits use it as hideout, but the original owners' ghosts still guard it. Heroes must choose: fight bandits or negotiate with spirits.

snippets.excerpt: Underground market hidden beneath the city, accessible only through secret entrances. Stalls carved from natural caves, lit by glowing fungi. Merchants trade in contraband, information, and rare artifacts. Always crowded, always watching for authorities.
snippets.conflict_hook: City guard plans raid. Market leaders need heroes to either warn everyone or help set up new location. Some merchants have information worth protecting.

snippets.excerpt: Ancient library built into a living tree, books growing on branches like fruit. Reading a book causes it to wither, but new ones sprout with different knowledge. Librarian is the tree's spirit, speaks through rustling leaves. Knowledge here is alive and changes.
snippets.conflict_hook: Disease threatens the tree. Books are dying faster than they grow. Heroes must find the source of corruption or help the spirit relocate to a new tree.
rp_cues: floor feels like walking on roots
scent of old paper and growing things

snippets.excerpt: Floating island tethered by massive chains to the ground below. Weather patterns are strange here, with localized storms and clear skies existing simultaneously. Inhabitants have adapted to the shifting gravity and wind patterns. Perfect for airship docking.
snippets.conflict_hook: Chains are weakening. Island will drift away or crash. Heroes must repair ancient mechanisms or find alternative anchoring. Some want it to drift free, others want it grounded.

snippets.excerpt: Crossroads where three major trade routes meet, marked by an ancient stone circle. Travelers leave offerings for safe passage. Local inn is built around the central stone, rooms arranged in a spiral. Stories say the crossroads can lead to other worlds if you know the right path.
snippets.conflict_hook: One of the paths has been corrupted, leading travelers to dangerous planes. Innkeeper needs heroes to close the corrupted path or find who opened it. Some travelers are trapped.
rp_cues: innkeeper knows more than they say
